title: Introducing: White Kite
body:
London four piece **White Kite** nail their soulful debut offering, _26_, merging some gloriously 80’s-esque songwriting with more modern production stylings.

Touches of SOHN and Blood Orange litter the track, whilst there’s more than a hint of sophomore record Bon Iver to the vocal line. Check out 26 below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
